name: IMMZ.DT.13.Tick-BorneEncephalitis
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give Tick-Borne Encephalitis vaccine according to the defined schedule

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - No Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = "No-doses and greater than or equal to 1 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because No dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " 1 doses given 1 to 3 months before and greater than 1 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because 1 dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - 2 Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " 2 doses and second dose given 5 to 12 months before and greater than 1 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because 2 doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - No Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "TBE-Moscow and EnceVir vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = "No-doses and greater than or equal to 3 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because no doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "TBE-Moscow and EnceVir  vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " 1 doses given 1 to 7 months before and greater than or equal to 3 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because 1 dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis  - 2 Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "TBE-Moscow and EnceVir vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " 2 doses and second dose given 12 months before and greater than or equal to 3 year old"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because 2 doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis - No Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – NO PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " No doses and in/travelling to endemic area"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because No doses

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis - 1 Dose
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – 1 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)

expression.description: "Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunization history" = " 1 dose given 1 to 2 weeks before and in/travelling to endemic area"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis because 1 dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Tick-Borne Encephalitis - 2 Doses
action.description: Provide Tick-Borne Encephalitis immunizations – using the "FSME-Immun and Encepur vaccine immunization – 2 PREVIOUS" schedule (3 dose scheme)
